overview: Courtney, the younger sister of Valerie, and her friends go to their condo for a weekend getaway, but Courtney can't get rid of the haunting feeling that a supernatural rockabilly driller killer is coming to murder them all.
tagline: The party begins when the lights go out!
cast: Crystal Bernard|Jennifer Rhodes|Kimberly McArthur|Patrick Lowe|Juliette Cummins
